		Preparing Students for Tomorrow
		
	CHHS provides its students with a balanced and meaningful education, both inside and outside the classroom. Our graduates are prepared to boldly face the challenges of the future with confidence, curiosity, and compassion.
AcademicsResources & Aid Committed to Our CommunityCHHS is an integral part of the Southern California community. We train its workforce, provide direct care and services, and transform lives.##open>115Klbs of food donated to fight nutrition insecurity in San Diego##open50%+of SD HHSA workforce is CHHS graduates##open12Centers & Institutes in the Region

Learn More
Reimagining ResearchCHHS is a research leader at SDSU. Our faculty and students are engaged in innovative, transformational, and community-focused research that is improving health and well-being throughout the region and beyond.Learn MoreIn the NewsSDSU’s 2023 Quest for the Best Winners NamedSDSU, SDSU Imperial Valley Student Leaders Journey To OaxacaFaculty Advocates for Paradigm Shift Regarding Indigenous HealthMore NewsFollow UsInstagramTwitterFacebookLinkedIn
